game.name: Bubblegum Balloon
game.description:
Wow! You are going to meet with a young boy who loves blowing bubbles with bubblegum. Today he has decided to blow the biggest balloons with his bubblegum. Would you help him to make his wish come true? Join Bubblegum Balloon and be prepared to guide him blow the best balloons timely! Just keep your fingers on your mouse and press and hold anywhere on the screen using it or tap the screen to make it blow until it reaches into the green circle around the boy!

This is the first time when this cute boy is trying to accept this kind of complex challenge. So guide him properly until he creates the best score in the end. The top portion of the screen will show your present score. Some good comments like â€œGreatâ€, â€œAwesomeâ€, â€œSuperbâ€, â€œGood Tryâ€, and â€œAlmostâ€ will keep flashing on the screen based on your performance. He relies on your skills a lot so do not lose hope until you learn how to blow up the perfect balloons using the bubblegum.

In case if you get bored with the simple and easy gameplay, feel free to try out other HTML5 arcade challenges on our website. We have catered to a huge collection of free boys and girls games that cover almost game category. The primary objective of these free online games is to keep you busy with the best possible fun and enjoyment. Stay connected with us to spot new arcade games and have a blast with your friends, no download required!
